help.title: User Manual
help.subtitle: Documentation and guides for using the system

intro.title: Introduction
intro.whatIsDescription: CaeliCrawler is an intelligent web crawling system for automated collection and analysis of municipal documents and websites. The system was specifically developed to extract relevant information from public sources and structure it using AI analysis.
intro.what_is_description: CaeliCrawler is an intelligent web crawling system for automated collection and analysis of municipal documents and websites. The system was specifically developed to extract relevant information from public sources and structure it using AI analysis.

features.webCrawlingDesc: Automatic search of websites for relevant documents
features.documentProcessingDesc: Text extraction from PDFs, HTML, Word documents
features.aiAnalysisDesc: Intelligent evaluation of content using Azure OpenAI
features.relevanceFilteringDesc: Automatic pre-filtering based on configurable keywords
features.structuredResultsDesc: Export findings as JSON or CSV
